mapper.sql: id, org_id, record_id, dept_id, dept_name, deleted, gmt_create, create_user, gmt_modify, modify_user, version
mapper.insert: insert into note_record_scope (id, org_id, record_id, dept_id, dept_name, deleted, gmt_create, create_user, gmt_modify, modify_user, version) values (#{id}, #{orgId}, #{recordId}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{deleted}, #{gmtCreate}, #{createUser}, #{gmtModify}, #{modifyUser}, #{version})

insert into note_record_scope
org_id,
record_id,
dept_id,
dept_name,
deleted,
gmt_create,
create_user,
gmt_modify,
modify_user,
version,
#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},

#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update note_record_scope
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update note_record_scope set org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_id = #{recordId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
